Eididh nan Clach Geala

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Eididh nan Clach Geala rises steeply above Lochan a' Chnapaich; on the other sides its slopes are more gentle. It enjoys stunning views northwest towards the distinctive mountains of Assynt and the Summer Isles.

 You have not climbed Eididh nan Clach Geala.

Region: Ullapool

Altitude: 927 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 3.29/5
Rating: 3.3/5 (42 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Beinn Dearg Munros circuit from Inverlael

Other routes and challenges

The return leg of the route given above also gives the fastest ascent if Eididh nan Clach Geala is to be climbed alone, although few have it as their main objective for a hill day.

A possible extension to the round given would be to include Seana Bhraigh - but this would be an extremely epic outing beyond the reach of most hillwalkers.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Ullapool B&B

Ullapool Cottages

The rightmost column shows how many summits were included in their report, which may help you to find the most relevant reports.
